name: BeerExamDrill
0:
”Alexa, start beer exam drill”
”Alexa, begin beer exam drill”
”Alexa, launch beer exam drill”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beer exam drill
des:
This skill selects beer style categories (using publicly available BJCP 2015 guidelines as a template), and challenges the user to identify which beer styles correspond to the named style numbers. This skill is intended to help a user learn different styles of beer, and as a study aid for beer style exams/certifications. 

This skill is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or endorsed by any group or association and is for fun and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
